synopsis.text:
Set in the backdrop of Japan's Taish≈ç era, a young woman named Haru Asagi finds herself employed as a maid in the esteemed Miyanomori household, a family of significant influence and affluence led by one of Japan's most formidable magnates. The family patriarch unexpectedly declares his retirement, triggering a power struggle among his six sons, each vying to succeed him as head of the family.

As the brothers' rivalry intensifies, Haru must navigate the complexities of their distinct personalities and the mounting tension within the household. Amidst this turmoil, she uncovers the true nature of each brother, their ambitions, and their secrets. Meanwhile, a looming threat promises to dismantle the very empire their father has built, adding an extra layer of intrigue and suspense to the unfolding drama.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
